nodes.text: A company of the Galactic Empire was stationed on the Outer Rim mining colony of New Valis. The infantry company consisted of stormtroopers, and was led by Imperial Army Lieutenant Fhaen, who was considered inexperienced, and had little to no combat experience. During the liberation of New Valis, the company fought against a platoon of Rebel Marines from the Rebel Alliance, and were eventually defeated and forced to retreat.
